headline: Does the Recent 21% Slide Signal Opportunity for Humana in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Humana stock is actually a bargain, or if it just looks like one after its recent slide? You are not alone in questioning whether now is a buying opportunity or a value trap. Humana’s share price has dropped sharply, down 21.1% over the last month and nearly 23% in the past year. This signals shifting market sentiment and a newly skeptical investor base. Recent headlines have highlighted major changes in the healthcare landscape. Insurers like Humana are under increased scrutiny...
